title: Use the Construction Industry Scheme (CIS) online service

details.description: Sign up or log in to use the Construction Industry Scheme online service - you can use it to file your contractor monthly returns
details.more_information:
If you're an existing user, just log in from the page on the HMRC website. 

If you're new to HMRC Online Services:

s1. Use the 'register' link.
s2. On the next page, use the 'sign up to HMRC Online services' link.

*[HMRC]: HM Revenue & Customs
*[CIS]: Construction Industry Scheme
details.introduction:
Sign up or log in to use the Construction Industry Scheme (CIS) online service - you can use it to file your monthly returns as a CIS contractor.

*[CIS]: Construction Industry Scheme
*[HMRC]: HM Revenue & Customs

details.description: Paying HMRC, employee expenses and benefits and paying staff

tags.title: Your pay, tax and the National Minimum Wage

details.description: Includes National Minimum Wage rates, keeping pay records and pay rights
Includes holidays and finding a job

related.title: What you must do as a Construction Industry Scheme (CIS) contractor

details.description: What you have to do under the Construction Industry Scheme if you're a contractor - registering, filing returns, paying subcontractors and keeping records

related.title: What you must do as a Construction Industry Scheme (CIS) subcontractor

details.description: What subcontractors in the building industry must do under the Construction Industry Scheme - registering, applying for gross payment status and reporting business changes

related.title: What is the Construction Industry Scheme (CIS)?

details.description: What the Construction Industry Scheme (CIS) is, who has to register, work that's included and excluded and what happens if your business is based outside the UK
